extended_tooltips.text: Immune to stuns while effect is active

name: pegasus_heroes|Button_name_Soulblade_Button
tooltip: Stun nearby enemies for <d ref="duckiesHeroKastielSoulblade_AbilStun.duration" style="Blue"/> seconds and augment weapon to attack <d ref="duckiesHeroKastielSoulblade_ASDisplayDummy.amount" style="Blue"/><Blue>%</> faster. While augmented weapon attack also stuns enemies for <d ref="duckiesHeroKastielSoulblade_WpnStun.duration"/> second. Lasts <d ref="duckiesHeroKastielSoulblade_Buff.duration"/> seconds.
